name: d3-hexjson
description: Generate hexmaps from data that uses the Open Data Institute's HexJSON format.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -g d3-array:d3 -n d3 -o build/d3-hexjson.js -- index.js
scripts.prepare: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-hexjson.js -c -m -o build/d3-hexjson.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-hexjson.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-hexjson.js build/d3-hexjson.min.js
